General.Name: Construtora Tenda S.A
General.Description: Construtora Tenda S.A. operates as a construction company that focuses on affordable apartments in Brazil. It engages in the general construction works, real estate development, real estate purchase and sale, the provision of general construction management services, and the intermediation of the sale of consortium shares. The company also holds interests in other companies. It operates in various metropolitan regions. The company was founded in 1969 is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Boa Vista, 280, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 01010-001
